snippet: For the new Broadway musical “Big Fish,” Susan Stroman isn’t just the director and choreographer. She is also a rainmaker.
abstract: Susan Stroman is not only director and choreographer for new Broadway musical, Big Fish, she is also rainmaker; Stroman has leveraged her reputation as five-time Tony Award winner for hits like The Producers and Contact to persuade investors to finance $14 million show.
lead_paragraph: For the new Broadway musical “Big Fish,” Susan Stroman isn’t just the director and choreographer. She is also a rainmaker.

headline.seo: For ‘Big Fish,’ Susan Stroman Lures Investors, Too
headline.main: Her Job Now Includes Reeling in Money
headline.print_headline: Her Job Now Includes Reeling In Money
